reviewDetails.comment:
Dr Capo listened, understood and took appropriate steps and answered all questions easily and patiently.  She even handled ordering a RX while I was on with her as she wanted to make sure it was readily available and would be ready for me to pick up soonest.  What a great time saver it was.  Sooner was definitely better.  
Her knowledge and personable demeanor are greatly appreciated!
Dr Capo was extremely professional and effective with the diagnosis. She made me very comfortable with the communication being a sensitive issue. Great experience
She was very sweet , efficient and knowledgeable. Although it was via video she made me feel as if I were right before her.

reviewDetails.comment: She is a true professional and caring doctor she is a credit to NYU
Dr. Reynolds is wonderful.  She listens and never rushes thru.  she is sweet and compassionate.  She is our family cardiologist and we are blessed to have found her.  God Bless Dr. Reynolds!
Dr Reynolds was extremely tentative and genuinely interested in my concerns.I would definitely recommend Dr Reynolds
